column3: Title

How do I stop my child from playing Roblox?
How do I get my 5-year-old child to stop playing so much Roblox?

Should you let a five-year-old play Roblox all night long or restrict the usage?
How do I make a 5-year-old stop being too competitive for his own good?

HI I have a 11 year old daughter who is addicted to playing roblox with her friends and changed when she started to do that, her attitude got way ruder than before and always closes her door and never comes out, what should I do?

How do I stop my 9 year old brother from playing Roblox all day long? He never listens me or my parents if we try to take it from he gets angry and starts hitting us, how do I stop him from playing Roblox?

How do I save my 10-yr old bro from Roblox? I'm 19 and we never fight. he plays it in the background in his online classes, and all day long. now he's ignoring schoolwork, gets upset when we mention it. I don't want to hurt him

I'm in middle school and I am addicted to Roblox. My grades are even going down. I try to not play it but I still I can't control it. What do I do to control it?

How should I stop my 13 year old from playing Roblox or the game Adopt me since she is obsessed and she doesn't study much. Her grades are going really low. She is also short

My son won’t stop playing Roblox. He then failed all his studies, so I took away all his stuff, banned him from eating food and drink, took away his bed and revoked all his privileges.
I caught my 12-year-old son playing Roblox. So I took his water privileges for 500 days and grounded him for 6 years. What else can I do to punish him?
I am 10 and I got addicted to one video game. It is the game called Roblox. It makes me talk to my parents about it a lot and they stop me from playing video games. Is Roblox getting me in trouble?
My daughter was playing Roblox when I said, “Can you stop playing now?” She got angry with me.

I broke my daughter's phone because she's addicted and was talking to herself while playing the game called Roblox. She was only 6 years old and spoke English but she wasn't talking to anyone. Did I do the right thing?
My parents are saying that buying Roblox gift cards are associated with gambling. I think it’s dumb. Can you tell me the truth?

How can I stop feeling bad for my dad? He always buys me the things I want and I take it for granted! As a child, I loved the game ROBLOX and my father brought me ROBUX and I spent it all in one month! He works so hard and I take it for granted!
